mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_EMAIL(USER_EMAIL, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_EXPIRY, AUTH_PURPOSE, AUTH_CONFIRMED) VALUES(#{user_email}, #{auth_code}, #{auth_expiry}, #{auth_purpose}, #{auth_confirmed})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_EMAIL, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_EXPIRY FROM AUTH_EMAIL WHERE AUTH_EXPIRY = (SELECT MAX(AUTH_EXPIRY) as AUTH_EXPIRY FROM AUTH_EMAIL WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{user_email})
